name: Sports2
description:
Hello there!

Me and Callum are making a sports game collection. It's pretty early at the moment but people seem to enjoy it so we thought we'd throw it up on here.

Currently you can play seven sports with all the rules you love from the real games. Yup. Total simulation. Honest

Some of the sports in there aren't very good. Some are alright. Sorry about that.

We're working on adding more sports and some other fun things. We think we're on to something special and we hope you do too.

Cheers.

---

WebGL is just Keyboard controls currently. The game isn't really meant for Keyboard, but it appears to work so go for it. Remember to fullscreen though.

PC Build was tested with DualShock 4 and 360 controllers.

---

INSTRUCTIONS:

Action: Bumper - S/K/5/Down

Power: Trigger - W/I/8/Up

Special: Stick-in - no keyboard support

Restart: R on keyboard - PS button on DualShock 4

Accept: X on DualShock 4 - B on 360

View Variants: Triangle on DualShock4 - X on 360, 2 on keyboard

Menu - M, PS button

BONUS - press '1' or '3' on the menu. Something definitely happens.

---

By Dziek Dyes-Bolt and Callum Keddie
